No, it doesn't matter, I was just kidding around.

::Scrap/Supernova/Flare/Vycir/Slasys::

Scrap nods, turning and running after the rest of the Galactors.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Supernova runs by Nue'e and stops a bit ways off so that he could have 
a good view of the battle. The other Galactors also run by her, Flare 
whistling at her as he passes. Scrap arrives a few seconds behind them 
all.

"Galactors, unite," Supernova says quietly, all the Galactors jumping 
into the air and transforming into body parts. A 44 foot robot soon 
stands where they used to stand, looking down at the battlefield. The 
robot had Supernova's intelligence, Flare's explosive weapons and 
temper, Scrap's repair system, Vycir's cloaking capabilities (although 
they wern't very good considering the size of the bot), and Slasys's 
weapon knowledge.

"Hey Perndabot," he says in a deep voice to the robot fighting below, 
accessing what had been programmed into the Galactors by Zardus to get 
the bot's name, "If you don't slag him, I get to try next."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry Zardus. I didnt think it mattered because she was my own 
character.
> 
> :::Banzai-Tron/Scourge/Hun-Grr:::
> 
> ::he takes an energon cube and starts to eat it::
> Banzai-Tron: No i think i can manage. You go out and slag 'em for 
me.
> ::He gets up and limps over to a CR chamber and gets in::
> ~~~~~
> Scourge: Scourge here, i havent found anything.
> ~~~~~
> Hun-grr: Yes! RIP Autobot!
> ::His two heads both try to bi
